o3smeasures.astvisitors

Class WeightMethodsPerClassVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTVisitor
      • o3smeasures.astvisitors.WeightMethodsPerClassVisitor

  • public class WeightMethodsPerClassVisitor
extends org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTVisitor
    A visitor for abstract syntax trees, that visits the given node to perform the calculation of the WMC (Weight Methods per Class) measure.
    Since:
    13/07/2014
    Author:
    Mariana Azevedo
    See Also:
    ASTVisitor
